headline: Here Are Friday’s Top Wall Street Analyst Upgrades and Downgrades: Apple, Comcast, Roblox, Zscaler and More
summary: Pre-Market Futures: The futures are trading higher on this Halloween Friday, following a rollercoaster day on Wall Street that ultimately saw all the major indices finish in the red, with the NASDAQ taking the biggest hit, down 1.58% on Thursday. headline: The great AI buildout shows no sign of slowing
summary: (Reuters) -A momentous week in the technology sector made it clear there is no sign the boom in building artificial intelligence infrastructure is slowing — despite the bubble talk.  Nvidia, whose processors are the AI revolution's backbone, became the first company to surpass $5 trillion in market value.  Microsoft and OpenAI inked a deal enhancing the ChatGPT maker's fundraising ability and OpenAI promptly started laying groundwork for an initial public offering that could value the company at $1 trillion.

headline: Caterpillar (CAT): Margin Decline to 14.3% Challenges Profit Growth Narrative
summary: Caterpillar (CAT) reported net profit margins of 14.3% this period, down from 16.3% the year before, as its earnings have grown at an impressive 20.7% annualized rate over the last five years but have recently trailed that average. The company’s revenue is forecast to grow at 5.7% per year, lagging behind the US market’s 10.3% expectation. Projected earnings growth stands at 13.8% per year compared to the market’s 15.9%. Investors see Caterpillar trading at a premium with a P/E ratio of 29.5x...
